oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interactions between soil cultivation in darkness, flaming, and brush weeding when used for in-row weed control in vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, Senior scientist Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interactions between soil cultivation in darkness, flaming and brush weeding on in-row weeds in vegetables were studied in two field experiments.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Melander, Senior scientist Bo (1998) Interactions between soil cultivation in darkness, flaming, and brush weeding when used for in-row weed control in vegetables. Biological Agriculture & Horticulture, 16 (1), pp. 1-14.
